name: Like Herding Cats (Shivmoo)
description:
Welcome to Like Herding Cats! 

Empereror KittiCaticuses cruiser has crashed!  Its up to the trusty roman automatic cat retrieval bots to do their job!

Controls -  Left Stick moves Yellow Bob Left trigger makes him jump. Right Stick moves Red Steve Right trigger makes him jump.

A/X in menu selects the current option, in end of level screen it restarts the level B/Y in menus takes you back, in the end of level screen it takes you to the menu. esc returns you to the menu from level, and quits in the menu.

How to play -  Get the cats to the end of the level as quickly as possible!  Each cat lost gives a 10 second time penalty.

Landing near a cat makes them jump out of the way. Beware of the dog speakers in a couple of levels. These have been accidentally left on repeat. The cats hate them!


ARMY OF ONE, TINY AWARD, SPACE CATS
